column4: The Synaptic version in 6.06 has no "showdisabledsoftwaresources", any ideas on how to perform this very same task?
!tell Gryzo1 -about repos
me too
i had the smae problem today Gryzo1
and what did you do ? hand edit?
i asked warbo and he told me
wait iam gonan paste to youu the lien i have added
thanks.
no problem
deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ dapper main restricted universe multiverse
here
in which file did you add this?
you have 2 ways
you can deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ dapper main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
no prob, i've used vi ;)
ot uou can do it via synaptic
settings->add->custom an then add this line
cat deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ dapper main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
damn sorry
echo deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ dapper main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
:) thanks
glad to be of a help Gryzo1
Now I need to remember why I wanted to add this :D
lol
